name: Halcyon 6: Lightspeed Edition
notes: You should create game folder, extraction will proceed directly in given directory

files.archive: N/A:Select the Linux installer downloaded from GOG

content:
files:
- archive: N/A:Select the Linux installer downloaded from GOG
game:
  exe: $GAMEDIR/H6.x86_64
  working_dir: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/
    file: $archive
